input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Atrium, HP_ServiceCenter
The configuration item concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document containing input of successful configuration items

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure.
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.
The response from the Delete Item(s) process if one is provided. Please check the adapter wrapper to determine if a response is provided.
An XML document containing input of failed configuration items

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Successfully deleted the Configuration Item with the following Request ID: ", .)
concat("Successfully deleted the Configuration Item with the following Request ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to delete Configuration Item with the following Request ID: ", .)
concat("Unknown Configuration Item with the following Request ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <delete-criteria>${delete by}</delete-criteria> <item> <parameters> <username>${login userid}</username> <password> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${login password}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${login password}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </password> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>${namespace name}</namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> </class-name-id> <xsl:element name="${delete criteria}"> <xsl:value-of select="//${delete criteria}/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> <dataset-id>${dataset}</dataset-id> <delete-option>${delete option}</delete-option> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <delete-criteria>${delete by}</delete-criteria> <item> <parameters> <username /> <password /> <login-info> <user-id>${login userid}</user-id> <password>${login password}</password> <lang>${login language}</lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>${namespace name}</namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> </class-name-id> <xsl:element name="${delete criteria}"> <xsl:value-of select="//${delete criteria}/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> <a-dataset-id>${dataset}</a-dataset-id> <delete-option>${delete option}</delete-option> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Configuration_Management:Searches:Get Configuration Item by Configuration Item ID

input.value: The value of new configuration items is :::

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create the following Configuration Item: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//class-name/text() = 'HPSC_Contact'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Successfully deleted the following Configuration Item: ${contact name value}</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Successfully deleted the following Configuration Item: ${configuration item value}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${failed configuration item} </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${configuration item} </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will delete a configuration item.
